messages.content: ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI is a prompt helper that allows users to use templates from https://prompter.fofr.ai/ in ComfyUI.
What are the two main nodes in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI?
The two main nodes in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI are 'Prompt from template' which turns a template into a prompt, and 'List sampler' which samples items from a list, sequentially or randomly.
How can users access the available prompt lists in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI?
Users can access the available prompt lists in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI by using the 'List sampler' node.
What is the purpose of the 'List sampler' node in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI?
The 'List sampler' node in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI is used to sample items from a list, either sequentially or randomly.
How can users explore the available prompt lists for ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI?
Users can explore the available prompt lists for ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI at https://prompter.fofr.ai/explore.
Where can users find the metadata for the available prompt lists in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI?
Users can find the metadata for the available prompt lists in ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI at https://github.com/ai-prompts/prompt-lists/blob/main/list-metadata.json.
Can ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI generate multiple items from multiple random lists?
Yes, ComfyUI-Prompter-fofrAI can generate multiple items from multiple random lists using the [random,2] syntax.
